items.sentence: Since you\'re going to the post office anyway, could you mail these for me?
Tom wanted to kiss Mary, but he wasn\'t sure if she wanted him to kiss her.
He failed to see the stop sign at the intersection and hit an oncoming car.
I thought there was a possibility that Tom was going to break the contract.
If you run into Tom, ask him when Mary is going to get out of the hospital.
Tom was really glad to hear that Mary hadn\'t been injured in the accident.
Tom grabbed a handful of popcorn out of the bag and then handed it to Mary.
Tom had planned to be the first one to get there, but Mary got there first.
Tom had trouble believing that Mary would actually want to go out with him.
Tom has finally returned to Boston after living in Chicago for three years.
